name: Scary Girl: Keep an eye on her
name_original: Scary Girl: Keep an eye on her
description:
An interesting short horror story game that will make you experience a surge of adrenaline. The essence of the game is as follows - you work as a nanny and you were asked to stay to look after the child during the departure of the parents. But no one expected what you will have to face... no nanny gets enough money to put up with this fiend! At first, everything goes according to plan, but then you will have to look for a way out of a situation in which you do not know how fate put you. Something supernatural is happening here...

if you want to feel a surge of adrenaline and tickle your nerves, then try to play this horror game...
